linkSkill.name: Innate Gift
linkSkill.shortDesc: Damage: +5%\nAttacks create a 100% chance of restoring 2% of Max HP/MP every sec. for 5 sec.\nCooldown: 30 sec.
details: Unaffected by cooldown resets, cooldown reduction, and buff duration increase

Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Hex - Boss Rush and Reinforce
  • Arts - Reinforce and Extra Strike
  • Void - Reinforce

nodeInfo.recommended:
Primary Trio
Secondary Trio
  • Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
  • 4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)
    • Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time

extraContent.title: Arts, Hex, and Void Skills
extraContent.content:
Adele has a secondary resource (unlocked in 2nd Job) called Aether Weaving that is used to activate certain skills and create 'Aether Swords' that can be commanded. Aether Weaving is generated passively and whenever you attack an enemy with a 'Trigger' skill

  • Every 100 'Aether Weaving', an Aether Sword is readied
  • When a sword is readied, you can summon it using Hunting Decree (3rd Job)
  • These swords are used primarily for and cannot be used before 3rd Job
  • Each sword represents 100 AE which skills that consume AE can use
  • In 2nd Job, you can hold up to 2 Swords (200 AE) at a time and 3 Swords (300 AE) in 4th Job+
  • Note if you use any skill that consumes AE, your Aether Sword will disappear and be consumed as AE

Below is a list of all Trigger skills:

  • Skewering (2nd Job)
  • Eviscerate (3rd Job)
  • Cleave (4th Job)
  • Plummet (4th Job)

primary.name: Reminiscence
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, you move to Erimos.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Magic Conversion
primary.shortDesc: 50% of your equipment's Magic ATT is converted to Attack Power, excluding your weapon. Any set effects do not apply. Only converts up to 20% of your weapon's base Attack Power.

primary.name: Exclusive Spell
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Attack Power and Magic ATT: +4%, Duration: 40 min
details: To obtain this skill, complete Khali's storyline
Affects all nearby players
Has a cooldown (2 hrs)

primary.name: Arts: Cross Cut
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 12, Damage: 120%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Enemies Hit: 5\nVoid Rush/Blitz cooldown -1 sec. on hit
details: Successful attacks will decrease the cooldown of and

primary.name: Spark
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5, allows you to jump a greater distance
details:
Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice
  • While in the air, if you combine this with the Up Arrow Key, you will perform a vertical jump
Horizontal jump can be used twice in a row

primary.name: Void Rush
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Quickly move in the selected direction\nCooldown: 5 sec.
details: Pressing the Left/Right Arrow Key and Skill Key together will dash in the given direction
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Flare
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +30, Defense: +200, Max MP: +500, and Knockback Resistance: +40%

primary.name: Patience
primary.shortDesc: Speed: +10, Jump: +10, Max Speed: +20, Avoidability: +30%

primary.name: Arts: Dual Edge
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 25, Damage: 160%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 6\nVoid Rush/Blitz cooldown -1 sec. on hit
primary.desc: Slash forward twice with your chakrams
details: Successful attacks will decrease the cooldown of and

primary.name: Arts: Crescentum
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 25, Damage: 230%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 8\nVoid Rush/Blitz cooldown -5 sec.\nCooldown: 5 sec.
details: Can only be used during or after a Void Skill to attack in the direction of the skill
When used, immediately decreases the cooldown of and

primary.name: Chakram Booster
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Increases attack speed of Chakram for 200 sec.

primary.name: Chakram Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Chakram Mastery: +50%\nAttack Power: +30

primary.name: Insanity I
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 30. Quickly move in the selected direction, attacking up to 6 enemies at 120% Damage 2 times.
Normal Monster Damage: +180%p
Dark Sight for 2 sec. when used
Cooldown: 5 sec.
primary.desc: Enhances , granting the ability to dash in 8 directions and now damages enemies in your path
details: When used, briefly enters Dark Sight state and hover while in the air
While dashing, pressing the Jump Key will immediately stop the dash
Can be used while casting Arts and Hex Skills
Deals increased %p Damage to regular monsters
Unaffected by Damage Reflect and cooldown resets

primary.name: Impulse
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +35%, Critical Damage: +35%

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: LUK +60

primary.name: Arts: Triple Bash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35, Damage: 220%, Number of Attacks: 5, Max Enemies Hit: 6\nVoid Rush/Blitz cooldown -1 sec. on hit
primary.desc: Slash forward several times with your chakrams
details: Successful attacks will decrease the cooldown of and

primary.name: Hex: Chakram Sweep
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 45. Throw a giant chakram. Damage: 300%, Number of Attacks: 7, Max Enemies Hit: 8\nCooldown: 6 sec.
primary.desc: Throw forward a giant chakram that damages and pushes enemies in its path

primary.name: Summon Chakri
primary.shortDesc: A 30% chance of creating a Chakri when defeating monsters or attacking Boss monsters\nAlways creates Chakris when Arts/Hex skills are cancelled by Void skills.\nCreated Chakris last for 30 sec. Up to 6 summonable. Can't be summoned near each other.
primary.desc: While toggled, defeating enemies with a Void Skill or attacking bosses have a chance to create a Chakri (up to 6)
details: Chakri are used to activate damaging projectiles from
Upon cancelling a Arts/Hex Skill using a Void Skill, a Chakri will be created
Adding Skill Points (SP) into will automatically grant this skill

primary.name: Resonate
primary.shortDesc: Hex skills convert Charkis within range into Resonates.\nResonates attack at 165% Damage 3 times and disappear after ricocheting up to 3 times.\nFinal Damage: -45% if hitting the same target multiple times
primary.desc: Using a Hex Skill will convert nearby Chakri into damaging projectiles that seek out enemies
details:
The projectiles can attack several times before disappearing
  • Damaging the same enemy will deal reduced %Final Damage after the first hit
Prioritizes bosses with the highest HP first
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Insanity II
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 30. Quickly move in the selected direction, attacking up to 6 enemies at 120% Damage 2 times.
Normal Monster Damage: +180%p
Dark Sight for 2 sec. when used
Can be used up to 2 times in a row.
Cooldown: 5 sec.
details: Increases attack's range and can be linked with a Hex Skill
Increases %Damage and Number of Attacks, %p Damage to regular monsters of attack

Can be used 2 times in quick succession before the cooldown is applied
  • While in the air, you can only dash up to the quick succession amount regardless of cooldown
  • Using any skill other than , , and Hex Skills will interrupt the quick succession
  • Linking Void->Hex->Void is possible, but Void->Arts (except )->Void is impossible

While casting, you can press the Skill Key again to buffer the next dash
  • Linking with can allow up to 4 dashes (or 6 in 4th Job)

primary.name: Void Enhance
primary.shortDesc: Increased Void Rush traveling distance.

primary.name: Deceiving Blade
primary.shortDesc: Void skills cast a buff for 10 sec. on hit.\nDuring this buff, manual attacks additionally attack at 370% Damage 2 times when they hit. Additional Attack Cooldown: 0.5 sec.
primary.desc: Upon successful Void Skill attacks, grants a short buff that provides an additional attack on successful Arts/Hex attacks
details: Additional attack will not trigger from Void skills, projectiles, and summons
Unaffected by Damage Reflect and buff duration increase

primary.name: Intuition
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage: +25%, Ignore Enemy DEF: +20%, Attack Power: +30\nArts: Crescentum Damage: +120%p

primary.name: Vigilance
primary.shortDesc: Max HP: +15%, Max MP: +15%, Abnormal Status Resistance: +30, All Elemental Resistance: +30%, Knockback Resistance: +60%, Damage Taken: -30%

primary.name: Arts: Flurry
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Damage: 290%, Number of Attacks: 7, Max Enemies Hit: 7\nVoid Rush/Blitz cooldown -1 sec. on hit
primary.desc: Slash forward in a flurry with your chakrams
details: Successful attacks will decrease the cooldown of and

primary.name: Hex: Chakram Split
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 75. Throw 4 giant chakram. Damage: 245%, Number of Attacks: 5, Max Enemies Hit: 10\nEach chakram can attack up to 4 times.\nCooldown: 14 sec.
primary.desc: Throw forward several chakrams that spin briefly before returning to your position
details: Chakrams damage enemies during its path and while spinning
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Hex: Chakram Fury
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70. Damage: 550%, Number of Attacks: 10, Max Enemies Hit: 10\nCooldown: 12 sec.
primary.desc: Unleash a storm of chakrams around you
details: When used in the air, you will float
While casting, you will not be knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)

primary.name: Void Blitz
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Cast 4 afterimages. Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 210%, Number of Attacks: 4\nDark Sight for 2 sec. when used\nCooldown: 6 sec.
primary.desc: Release several afterimages forward that damage enemies it passes through
details: When used, briefly enters Dark Sight state
Each afterimage is considered a separate attack and the effect of is applied to each individually
Right-clicking the skill will toggle a function ON/OFF to activate this skill when using without any Arrow Keys pressed
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Desert Veil
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 150. Invincible for 3 sec.\nCooldown: 75 sec.
details: While active, no skills except for and can be used
Pressing the Skill Key again will end the buff early
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Hero of the Flora
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec

primary.name: Floran Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 360 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds

primary.name: Insanity II
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 50. Quickly move in the selected direction, attacking up to 7 enemies at 210% Damage 4 times.
Normal Monster Damage: +350%p
Dark Sight for 2 sec. when used
Can be used up to 3 times in a row.
Cooldown: 5 sec.
details: Increases %Damage, Number of Attacks, and Max Enemies Hit of attack
Increases %p Damage to regular monsters of attack
Can be used 3 times in a row

primary.name: Chakram Expert
primary.shortDesc: Chakram Mastery: +70%, Attack Power: +30, Critical Damage: +8%

primary.name: Ascend
primary.shortDesc:
Resonate Damage: +200%p.
Resonate Ricochet Count +1.
Summon Chakri Chance +45%.
Hex: Chakra Sweep Damage +400%p.
Arts: Crescentum Damage +130%p.

primary.name: Redemption
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage: +30%, Enemy DEF Ignored: +20%, Boss Damage: 30%

hyperPassive.name: Trigger - Reinforce
details: Increases %Damage of all Trigger skills

hyperPassive.name: Trigger - Guardbreak
details: Increases %Ignore DEF of all Trigger skills

hyperPassive.name: Trigger - Boss Rush
details: Increases %Boss Damage of all Trigger skills

hyperPassive.name: Resonance Rush - Efficiency
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Obtain 20 aether when aether crystal is used for Resonance Rush. Does not consume aether when using Impale.

hyperPassive.name: Will to Live - Aura Reinforce
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Recovery Ratio: +3%, additive to existing recovery.

hyperPassive.name: True Nobility - Shield Reinforce
details: Increases %Damage while shield is active

hyperActive.name: Shardbreaker
hyperActive.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 250, creates a shard in the location of up to 7 enemies.
For each shard that is created and shattered, Max Enemies Hit: 7, Damage: 2000%, Number of Attacks: 6
If total enemies struck is lower than the max, creates up to 5 shards in random locations.
After shards shatter, creates up to 5 aether crystals.
Cooldown: 60 sec
hyperActive.desc: Creates shards at the location of enemies that explode
details: Deals damage when the shards land and explode

Creates at the location of the explosion (up to 5 crystals)
  • If the number of enemies hit is less than the max, crystals will be created in random locations

hyperActive.name: Blade Torrent
hyperActive.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 300, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 1000%, Number of Attacks: 12
Stun Duration: 10 sec
Stun Duration: +100% depending on damage inflicted with Blade Torrent.
Cooldown: 180 sec
hyperActive.desc: Launches swords that binds nearby enemies

hyperActive.name: Divine Wrath
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Applies to any Flora class in the party.

fifthMain.name: Ruin
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Max Enemies Hit: 15
An attack that deals 500% damage 6 times when summoned and activates 12 times.
After it's summoned, an additional sword pierce deals 900% damage 9 times and activates 8 times.
Cooldown: 60 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summons a giant sword that rains down from the sky dealing damage while coming down and after it lands
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Infinity Blade
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, invincible during casting and disarmament
Duration: 30 sec, creates 18 aether swords that attack 2 times with 700% damage
On successful hits, 5% chance to create an aether crystal.
Cooldown 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: Creates several special Aether Swords that seek out and attack nearby enemies like
details: Infinity Blade Aether Swords are only affected by and cannot trigger or
Has a small chance to create a crystal
You are invincible at the initial cast and at the end of the skill
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Legacy Restoration
fifthMain.shortDesc:
2% max MP will be consumed every sec while casting and after casting
Duration: 30 sec, Damage: 40%, Aether obtained: 75%, +2 aether swords that can be commanded with Hunting Decree
Periodically spreads enchanted wings to attack 6 mobs with 1800% damage 3 times and restores 9.5% of max HP for you and your party members.
Cooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: Increases %Damage, Aether generation rate, and the maximum number of swords commanded by
details: Periodically, your wings flap dealing damage to nearby enemies and healing nearby party members and yourself

fifthMain.name: Storm
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 500, Duration: 14 sec. Automatically attacks up to 7 nearby enemies periodically, for 500% damage 2 time(s).\nUpon casting, once more than 2 aether swords have been commanded, the skill's attack count is increased by 2 for each pair of aether swords beyond those first two.\nCooldown: 90 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Creates a storm of swords to gather and surround yourself
details: Requires swords to be active to use
When more than 1 pair of swords are active, the attack count is increased by 2 for each pair of swords beyond the first pair
Pressing the Skill Key again will end the skill early
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

meta: Khali is LUK thief class part of the Flora class group. Khali utilize Chakrams as their primary weapons. For their secondary weapon, Khali can equip Hex Seekers
